data.title: How to reach us?
data.text:
I agree that contents of OpenStreetMap are shown to me.

From S Bahn / suburban train station Humboldthain

walk along Hussitenstraße until corner Gustav-Meyer Allee; enter TIB area, walk straight on about 200 m until building 13b; through entrance 7 using stairs or an elevator around the corner to the 5th floor, keep right to reach the chair

From U Bahn / underground train station Voltastraße

walk along Voltastraße about 400 m to Deutsche Welle; enter TIB area going to the right through a passage, walk straight on about 100 m until a fence; go through a gate and walk about 150 m straight on until building 13b; through entrance 7 using stairs or an elevator around the corner to the 5th floor, keep right to reach the chair

From Bahnhof / train station Gesundbrunnen

walk along Brunnenstraße to corner Gustav-Meyer Allee; walk along Gustav-Meyer Allee to corner Hussitenstraße; enter TIB area, walk straight on about 200 m to building 13b; through entrance 7 using stairs or an elevator around the corner to the 5th floor, keep right to reach the chair

From Berlin main station

take S3 (direction Erkner) or S5 (direction Strausberg Nord) or S7 (direction Ahrensfelde) or S9 (direction Berlin Airport) or S75 (direction Wartenberg) until S Bahn / surburban train station Friedrichstraße; go downstairs and take S2 (direction Bernau) or S26 (direction Waidmannslust) or S1 (direction Oranienburg) until S Bahn / surburban train station Humboldthain; further see above

From Berlin Airport

take FEX to Bahnhof / train station Gesundbrunnen; or take RE8 (direction Wismar Bahnhof) or RB23 (direction Potsdam, Golm Bahnhof) to S Bahn / surburban train station Ostkreuz, switch to the Ringbahn / circle line S42 (not S41) to S Bahn / surburban train station Gesundbrunnen; further see above
